alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade and central Broward Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 501 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sawgrass Mills Mall to Sunshine Acres to Miami Lakes. Movement was southwest at 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Coral Springs, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Miami Gardens, Lauderhill, Weston, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Opa-Locka, Royal Palm Ranches, Palm Springs North, Sunshine Acres, Country Club and Pennsuco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
